Issue.creator: sanchezl
Issue.description: The self-signed certificates generated for the peer/chaincode connection do not contain the required fields of {{Issuer}} and {{Subject}} (see RFC 5280 ยง4.1.2.2|https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5280#section-4.1.2.4 ). This causes problems in Java chaincode as the JDK libraries validate that certificates contain all required fields.
